Class MoveUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    this class contains utilities used during the check to check the validity of the action

                                         Player player,

        check if the region ID contained into the action is a valid region ID
        Parameters:
        board - the board of the game
        player - the player who has performed the action
        action - the action performed by the player
        Returns:
        true if the check is passed

        action - the action performed by the player
        Returns:

        public static boolean checkBlockedZone(int numberOfPlayer,
                                       Action action)
        checks player count and the presence of additional production/harvest/market spaces
        Parameters:
        numberofPlayers - the number of players registered to the game
        action - the action performed by the player
        Returns:
        true if the action is on a blocked area, false otherwise

        public static boolean checkNotFoundCard(Board board,
                                        Action action)
        Checks that the actionspace actually has a card
        Parameters:
        board - the board of the game
        action - the action performed by the player
        Returns:
        false if the actionspace should have a card and doesn't, true otherwise

      • addActionSpaceBonus

        public static void addActionSpaceBonus(Board board,
                                       Player player,
                                       Action action)
        add the bonus contained into the action space to the resources of the player. If the player is flagged by a LESSRESOURCE excommunication effect, the effect its applied for every ind of resource taken
        Parameters:
        board - the board of the game
        player - the player who has performed the action
        action - the action performed by the player
